reason: Bitcoin faces significant downward pressure due to continued ETF outflows, erasing recent gains and suggesting institutional distribution. Coupled with a major security breach causing a near-total loss for an altcoin and high volatility in XRP futures, the overall market risk is elevated. Investors should anticipate further price corrections and increased volatility.
headlines: A ruble stablecoin outpaced market leaders last year despite international sanctions
Bitcoin ETF optimism fades as three-day outflows streak erases early-month gains
Builders behind popular Zcash wallet Zashi to launch new startup 'cashZ'
Truebit token crashes 99.9% after hacker drains $26.6 million in ether
XRP slips to $2.12 after liquidations clear both sides of the futures book
